column5: J went shopping (again) this morning. I was in the midst of finishing some bathroom renovations and was apprehensive as to what she was out shopping for. Anyhow I heard her arrive and winced as I yelled out "what did you get?". She didn't answer and just brought me two boxes and said "happy Easter". You just gotta love a 65 year old sweetie who goes to the trouble of finding an old prop in the garage and driving out to the marine dealer to get you some boat stuff. Bless her pointy little ears.....
Very nice, thats going to look good on the motor.  Good Luck with it.
Thats a pretty nice easter present roy,  you must been well behaved latley for an awsome gift like that.....cheers     HAPPY EASTER EVERYONE
Geez Roy..I was working on bathroom reno's today too...Wonder what I'm gonna get later?  That new prop sure looks nice!!!

wow, what a surprise!!  my surprise was, that i was "allowed" to spend 100 bucks on something i wanted heh....  Hummingbird Smartcast Fishfinder for my shorefishing adventures, works good too! ....Bud
You've got yerself a fine lady there Roy, she treats you well  !!  She also makes the best zucchini relish I've ever eaten too
Very nice, Roy.  That J is a sweetie for sure.  Happy Easter to you both.
What a lady you have there Roy!  My question is what happened to the original prop?Chop Chop?
Congrats bud!  Going to keep her?  Whopper
Roy,your so SPOILED bud.  Happy Easter  Steve
Now thats nice Day of resurecting props
Haha she just wants you outta the house
Very nive Roy! Always good to have a spare prop. The $64,000 question though, what Lowrance did you get?  Happy Easter Roy & J
Ahhhhhh! You are right Roy she sure is a sweetie!  Happy Easter all!
Ron, it's the LCX-25C
Those are very nice Bubba!!!... now all you need is a console!
NICE!!!  That'll look good on your SC!
Thanks Ron. I didn't really need the LCX but it makes a durn good windscreen when you run a tiller.
Shes way too good for you dude...

You tryin to change that motor into a Merc one piece at a time Bud?  And like everyone else has said....you've got a keeper there Roy! Enjoy the new Lowrance...I hear Ron's an expert at install and he'll be down next weekend to put it on!
65 year old sweetie ? how did you get a girl so much younger than you?
Buzz off, Paul. :-)
